## load necessary packages

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(lmerTest)
```

## import data
```{r}
d <- read_csv('../csv/prepost_recog_accuracy.csv')  %>%
   filter(roi_formatted == 'V1') 

m <- lmer(correct ~ phase * trained + (1 | subj), data = d)
summary(m)
```
